src:
Zvezda gubi na poluvremenu: Stativa, prečka, pa Lo Selso [VIDEO]
06 Nov 2019, 21:50 by Milos
U toku je utakmica četvrtog kola B grupe Lige šampiona između Crvene zvezde i Totenhema.
Gosti iz Londona vode sa 1:0 golom Đovanija Lo Selsa u 34. minutu.
Prvo je Kejn pogodio stativu, pa Son prečku, crveno-bekli nisu uspeli da otklone opasnost, a lopta je stigla do Argentinca, koji ju je butinom poslao u mrežu.



Imala je i Zvezda prilike, ali je šut Pavkova odbranio Gazaniga, dojk je Van La Para pogodio stativu u finišu, nakon odbitka umalo i Sančez da postigne autogol.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Star loses at halftime: Tripod, cross, then Lo Selso [VIDEO]
06 Nov 2019, 20:50 by Milos
The fourth round of Group B of the Champions League between Red Star and Tottenham is underway.
The visitors from London lead with a 1-0 goal by Giovanni Lo Sels in the 34th minute.
First, Kane hit a tripod, then Son crossed, the red-backs failed to clear the danger, and the ball reached the Argentine, who threw it into the net with his thigh.



Star also had a chance, but Pavkova's shot was defended by Gazanig, Van La Para's breast hit a tripod in the finish, after deduction almost by Sanchez to score.
